title: Pullman Mascot: Five-Star Sydney Weekend Getaway
description: Escape for a weekend in vibrant Sydney at this stylish five-star property, sitting on the doorstep of Sydney's airport and conveniently close to the city's beaches and entertainment hubs. Enjoy daily breakfasts for two, free Wi-Fi, late checkout, a bottle of wine on arrival and a 25% discount when you dine at the Mobius Bar and Grill.

title: Five-Star Pullman Sydney Escape near Airport & Mascot Train Station with Onsite Restaurant
description:
Embrace the cosmopolitan charms of the Harbour City with a lavish five-star stay at this Pullman hotel, perfectly positioned for seamless travel, mere moments from the Sydney Airport and a short train ride from the CBD. From a light-filled lobby to aesthetically designed rooms, this hotel acts as an ideal base for a Sydney stopover, combining convenience with signature Pullman luxury.

Explore the vibrant restaurant and cafe scene of Alexandria, including local favourites like Da Mario Pizza and Gelato Messina Rosebery, or go sightseeing at iconic attractions such as the Opera House and the Harbour Bridge, all a short drive away. After a day of exploration, return to your hotel to enjoy a live wok station and signature grilled delicacies at the Mobius Bar & Grill, best paired with cocktails.
offer_address: 191 O'Riordan Street, Mascot, New South Wales 2020, Australia
